attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing to oppose the increase in fees proposed in USCIS-2006-0044. The
international adoption process is expensive and USCIS gives very little service for
the fees charged. Our I-600 will most likely expire prior to travel, as it will for the
majority of families adopting from China over the next couple of years. It would
make more sense to incease the period of valitity of the I-600, which would reduce
the number of duplicate appointments required under the current system.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Kristen Koines

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kristen E. Koines
